channel.title: Bow String ¤ Help please ¤

item.title: Bow String ¤ Help please ¤
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Jp Owner Jp
item.description:
@Owner_Jp wrote:

How do I make it so that when you use a knife on flax and vice versa, that it gives you a bowstring and deletes the flax?

[code] } else if (itemUsed == 1779 && useWith == 946) {
if (playerLevel[9] >= 1) {
deleteItem(1779, 1);
addItem(1777, 1);
deleteItem(1779, getItemSlot(1521), 1);
addSkillXP((55 * playerLevel[9]), 9);
}

	} else if (itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1779) {
                if (playerLevel[9] >= 1) {
                    deleteItem(1779, 1);
                    addItem(1777, 1);
                    addSkillXP((55 * playerLevel[9]), 9);
		} [/code]

Thats what im using, It gives me error and points at the deleteItem, deleteitem(1779, 1);
^

Same on both of em.

Read full topic
